sentences.en: B - splines are piecewise polynomial curves that have a parametric representation.
sentences.cn: 最后,B样条,之前曾经提到过,是由分段(很多基础曲线片断组成)参数化表示的多项式曲线组成.

sentences.en: Eigenvalue method is one of the fundamental Methods: That solve polynomial system.
sentences.cn: 特征值方法是求解多项式方程组的基本方法之一.

sentences.en: Every polynomial is differentiable, and so is every rational.
sentences.cn: 每个多项式都是可微的, 而每个有理函数也是如此.

sentences.en: I have no idea about factorable polynomial.
sentences.cn: 我对可因子分解多项式一无所知。

sentences.en: It give the solution for polynomial equations using simplex method.
sentences.cn: 它提供的解决方案多项式方程组采用单纯形法.

sentences.en: Its form up to a tenth degree polynomial is shown below.
sentences.cn: 下面写出一直到十次多项式的帕斯卡三角形.

sentences.en: Regression analysis includes linear, polynomial and exponential curve fitting, plotting, and interpolation.
sentences.cn: 回归分析包括线, 适合的多项式和指数的曲线, 绘制, 以及篡改.

sentences.en: Some applications of the fast Fourier transform to the polynomial calculation.
sentences.cn: 多项式计算当中快速傅立叶变换的应用.

sentences.en: The absolute values of the coefficients of any chromatic polynomial form a unimodal sequence.
sentences.cn: 任何多项式系数的绝对值都构成单峰序列.

sentences.en: The algebra AQ is called a quantum polynomial algebra.
sentences.cn: 代数AQ叫做量子多项式代数.

sentences.en: The bit - operation complexity of the fast exponential algorithm is polynomial.
sentences.cn: 快速指数算法的比特运算复杂度是多项式的.

sentences.en: The curve mesh body created is a polynomial bicubic.
sentences.cn: 生成的曲线网格体是双三次多项式的.

sentences.en: The number a is called a double root of the polynomial function f.
sentences.cn: 数a称为多项式丞数f的二重根.

sentences.en: The polynomial factors in the harmonic - oscillator wave functions are called Hermite polynomials after a French mathematician.
sentences.cn: 谐振子波函数的多项式因子随一法国数学家之名而叫做厄米多项式.

sentences.en: This algorithm can simplify the data association and has polynomial complexity.
sentences.cn: 该算法采用观测-航迹关联,具有相对简单的多项式复杂度.

words.tran_cn: [数]多项式；由 2 字以上组成的学名

phrases.tran_cn: 三次多项式；立方次多项式

trans.tran_cn: 多项式的，多词学名（指由两个以上的词构成的学名）的
trans.tran_en: of, consisting of, or referring to two or more names or terms

trans.tran_cn: 多项式，由2字以上组成的学名
trans.tran_en: a statement in  algebra  that contains several different numbers and signs which are equal to a specific amount
